doc:
Christopher Chaplin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_Chaplin 0 Christopher James Chaplin (born 6 July 1962) is a Swiss-born English composer and actor. He is the youngest son of film comedian Charlie Chaplin and his fourth wife, Oona O'Neill. Christopher_James_Chaplin ( born 6_July_1962 ) is a_Swiss-born_English_composer_and_actor . He is the_youngest_son of film_comedian_Charlie_Chaplin and his_fourth_wife , Oona_O'Neill .
